idea-plugin.name: Which-Key
idea-plugin.description:
IdeaVim extension that displays available keybindings in a popup.


Usage
  • Activate the plugin in your .ideavimrc file with `set which-key`
  • Either disable the timeout option or increase the timeoutlen (default: 1000ms)
    • `set notimeout`
    • `set timeoutlen=5000`

More options

For more information visit the corresponding Github repository.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.11.0

  • Update API support for IdeaVIM version 2.24.0
  • Enables proper functionality for special keys like <C-c>, <M-c>, <Esc>
  • Make custom descriptions work properly with special key mappings (e.g. <C-w>s)
  • Allow setting of custom descriptions for builtin commands
  • Fix check for recursive mappings
